Text:
Why does this one has 17GB? There are other torrents with this season 720p with only 4~5 GB..
Whats the main difference?

17GB is the right filesize for 720p, meaning that every episode is around 500MB.

The ones of 5GB are fake, low quality or just SD disguised as HD.
